title: Drawing, "Looking Toward Distant Hills, Hudson Valley, New York", 1870–80
medium: Brush and oil, graphite traces on thin paperboard
inscribed: Inscribed on verso in graphite, lower center:  Thatadin?
description: View across a wooded valley toward distant mountain range. Sky is cloudy, slightly reddened with patch of blue.   A hill slope in right foregound.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Looking Toward Distant Hills, Hudson Valley, New York", 1870–80.
1870–80. Brush and oil, graphite traces on thin paperboard. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-551.
